mapper.sql: cl_id, cl_name, cl_english_name, cl_code, cl_status, cl_blockup, cl_type, cl_level, cl_max_hotel, cl_pid, cl_country_id, cl_province_id, cl_city_id, cl_district, cl_address, cl_admin_name, cl_zip_code, cl_contacter, cl_contact_no, cl_fax, cl_email, cl_legal_person, cl_intro, cl_registered_capital, cl_asset_size, cl_create_time, cl_create_by, cl_modify_time, cl_modify_by, cl_logo, cl_country_code, cl_province_code, cl_city_code, cl_region, cl_website, cl_addr_en
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from perms.perms_t_group_hotel
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into perms.perms_t_group_hotel (cl_id, cl_name, cl_english_name, cl_code, cl_status, cl_blockup, cl_type, cl_level, cl_max_hotel, cl_pid, cl_country_id, cl_province_id, cl_city_id, cl_district, cl_address, cl_admin_name, cl_zip_code, cl_contacter, cl_contact_no, cl_fax, cl_email, cl_legal_person, cl_intro, cl_registered_capital, cl_asset_size, cl_create_time, cl_create_by, cl_modify_time, cl_modify_by, cl_logo, cl_country_code, cl_province_code, cl_city_code, cl_region, cl_website, cl_addr_en ) values (#{clId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{clBlockup,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{clType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{clLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{clMaxHotel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clCountryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clAdminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clContactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clRegisteredCapital,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{clAssetSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{clCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{clModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clAddrEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

cl_english_name = #{record.clEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_code = #{record.clCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_status = #{record.clStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

update perms.perms_t_group_hotel set cl_id = #{record.clId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_name = #{record.clName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_english_name = #{record.clEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_code = #{record.clCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_status = #{record.clStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_blockup = #{record.clBlockup,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_type = #{record.clType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_level = #{record.clLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_max_hotel = #{record.clMaxHotel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cl_pid = #{record.clPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_country_id = #{record.clCountryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_province_id = #{record.clProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_city_id = #{record.clCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_district = #{record.clDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_address = #{record.clAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_admin_name = #{record.clAdminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_zip_code = #{record.clZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_contacter = #{record.clContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_contact_no = #{record.clContactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_fax = #{record.clFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_email = #{record.clEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_legal_person = #{record.clLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_intro = #{record.clIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_registered_capital = #{record.clRegisteredCapital,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cl_asset_size = #{record.clAssetSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cl_create_time = #{record.clCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cl_create_by = #{record.clCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_modify_time = #{record.clModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cl_modify_by = #{record.clModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_logo = #{record.clLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_country_code = #{record.clCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_province_code = #{record.clProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_city_code = #{record.clCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_region = #{record.clRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_website = #{record.clWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_addr_en = #{record.clAddrEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update perms.perms_t_group_hotel
cl_name = #{clName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_english_name = #{clEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_code = #{clCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_status = #{clStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cl_blockup = #{clBlockup,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cl_type = #{clType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cl_level = #{clLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
cl_max_hotel = #{clMaxHotel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cl_pid = #{clPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_country_id = #{clCountryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_province_id = #{clProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_city_id = #{clCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_district = #{clDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_address = #{clAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_admin_name = #{clAdminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_zip_code = #{clZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_contacter = #{clContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_contact_no = #{clContactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_fax = #{clFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_email = #{clEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_legal_person = #{clLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_intro = #{clIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_registered_capital = #{clRegisteredCapital,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
cl_asset_size = #{clAssetSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
cl_create_time = #{clCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cl_create_by = #{clCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_modify_time = #{clModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cl_modify_by = #{clModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_logo = #{clLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_country_code = #{clCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_province_code = #{clProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_city_code = #{clCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_region = #{clRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_website = #{clWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cl_addr_en = #{clAddrEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cl_id = #{clId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update perms.perms_t_group_hotel set cl_name = #{clName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_english_name = #{clEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_code = #{clCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_status = #{clStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_blockup = #{clBlockup,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_type = #{clType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_level = #{clLevel,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, cl_max_hotel = #{clMaxHotel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cl_pid = #{clPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_country_id = #{clCountryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_province_id = #{clProvinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_city_id = #{clCityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_district = #{clDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_address = #{clAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_admin_name = #{clAdminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_zip_code = #{clZipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_contacter = #{clContacter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_contact_no = #{clContactNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_fax = #{clFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_email = #{clEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_legal_person = #{clLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_intro = #{clIntro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_registered_capital = #{clRegisteredCapital,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cl_asset_size = #{clAssetSize,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, cl_create_time = #{clCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cl_create_by = #{clCreateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_modify_time = #{clModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cl_modify_by = #{clModifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_logo = #{clLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_country_code = #{clCountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_province_code = #{clProvinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_city_code = #{clCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_region = #{clRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_website = #{clWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cl_addr_en = #{clAddrEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cl_id = #{clId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT cl_id,cl_name,cl_type,cl_pid FROM perms.perms_t_group_hotel WHERE cl_pid=#{cl_id}
SELECT cl_id,cl_name,#{grpId} AS cl_pid FROM perms.perms_t_department WHERE cl_pid ISNULL and cl_hotel_id=#{grpId} and cl_status = ${@com.sstc.hmis.model.constants.Constants@STATUS_NORMAL}
SELECT cl_id,cl_name, cl_pid FROM perms.perms_t_department WHERE cl_pid=#{cl_id} and cl_status = 0
mapper.update:
UPDATE perms.perms_t_group_hotel SET cl_status=#{status} ,cl_blockup=#{blockup} WHERE cl_id IN
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM perms.perms_t_group_hotel WHERE cl_id IN ( SELECT cl_work_hotel_id FROM perms.perms_t_staff_hotel WHERE cl_status = 0 AND cl_staff_id = #{clStaffId} ) AND cl_status = 0

WITH RECURSIVE T (cl_id, cl_name , cl_pid, DEPTH) AS ( SELECT a.cl_id , a.cl_name , a.cl_pid, 1 AS DEPTH FROM perms.perms_t_department a
WHERE a.cl_pid IS NULL
WHERE a.cl_pid = #{pId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and a.cl_hotel_id = #{hotelId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_status = '0' union SELECT b.cl_id, b.cl_name, b.cl_pid , T.DEPTH + 1 AS DEPTH FROM perms.perms_t_department b JOIN T ON b.cl_pid = T.cl_id where b.cl_status = '0') select T.cl_id as clDepId, T.cl_name as clDepName, T.cl_pid as clParentId, count(a.cl_staff_id) as clSize , T.DEPTH as clDepth FROM T left JOIN perms.perms_t_staff_hotel a on T.cl_id = a.cl_dpt_id and a.cl_status = '0' group by T.cl_id, T.cl_name, T.cl_pid, T.DEPTH order by T.DEPTH, cl_pid
select distinct cl_staff_id from perms.perms_t_staff_hotel where cl_dpt_id = #{deptId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and cl_status = '0'

select b.cl_id as clGroupId, b.cl_name as clGroupName, b.cl_hotel_id as clHotelId, c.cl_name as clHotelName from perms.perms_t_staff_team a left join perms.perms_t_work_team b on a.cl_team_id = b.cl_id and b.cl_status <> '1' left join perms.perms_t_group_hotel c on b.cl_hotel_id = c.cl_id and c.cl_status = '0' where a.cl_status = '0' and a.cl_staff_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cl_staff_id as clUserId from perms.perms_t_staff_team where cl_team_id = #{workGroupId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

WITH RECURSIVE T (cl_id, cl_name , cl_pid, DEPTH) AS ( SELECT a.cl_id , a.cl_name , a.cl_pid, 1 AS DEPTH FROM perms.perms_t_department a WHERE a.cl_id = #{depId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_hotel_id = #{hotelId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_status = '0' union SELECT b.cl_id, b.cl_name, b.cl_pid , T.DEPTH + 1 AS DEPTH FROM perms.perms_t_department b JOIN T ON b.cl_pid = T.cl_id where b.cl_status = '0') SELECT sh.cl_staff_id as clUserId, COALESCE (s.cl_family_name, '') || COALESCE (s.cl_name, '') AS clUserName, s.cl_avatar as clAvatar FROM perms.perms_t_staff_hotel sh INNER JOIN T ON sh.cl_dpt_id = T .cl_id INNER JOIN perms.perms_t_staff s ON sh.cl_staff_id = s.cl_id AND s.cl_status = '0' WHERE sh.cl_status = '0'

select DISTINCT a.cl_work_hotel_id as clHotelId, b.cl_name as clHotelName from perms.perms_t_staff_hotel a left join perms.perms_t_group_hotel b on a.cl_work_hotel_id = b.cl_id and b.cl_status = '0' where a.cl_status = '0' and a.cl_staff_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.cl_work_hotel_id

select a.cl_dpt_id as clDeptId, b.cl_name as clDeptName, c.cl_name as clJob from perms.perms_t_staff_hotel a left join perms.perms_t_department b on a.cl_dpt_id = b.cl_id and b.cl_status = '0' left join perms.perms_t_post_responsibility c on a.cl_post_id = c.cl_id and c.cl_status = '0' where a.cl_staff_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_work_hotel_id = #{hotelId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_status = '0'

select b.cl_id as clLinkmanId, COALESCE (b.cl_family_name, '') || COALESCE (b.cl_name, '') as clLinkmanName, c.cl_name as clLinkmanDeptName, e.cl_name as clLinkmanHotelName, d.cl_name as clLinkmanJob, b.cl_mobile_phone as clLinkmanPhone, b.cl_avatar as clLinkmanAvatar from perms.perms_t_staff_hotel a left join perms.perms_t_staff b on a.cl_staff_id = b.cl_id and b.cl_status = '0' left join perms.perms_t_department c on a.cl_dpt_id = c.cl_id and c.cl_status = '0' left join perms.perms_t_post_responsibility d on a.cl_post_id = d.cl_id and d.cl_status = '0' left JOIN perms.perms_t_group_hotel e on a.cl_work_hotel_id = e.cl_id and e.cl_status = '0' where a.cl_grp_id = #{grpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.cl_status = '0' and (d.cl_name like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or c.cl_name like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.cl_family_name like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.cl_name like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or COALESCE (b.cl_family_name, '') || COALESCE (b.cl_name, '') like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.cl_mobile_phone like #{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select cl_id from perms.perms_t_group_hotel where cl_status = 0 and cl_blockup = 0
